mapper.select: SELECT a.nick, a.name, a.id, b.count_follow, a.orgfilename FROM ( SELECT id_follow, count(id_follow) AS count_follow FROM acorn_follow GROUP BY id_follow ) b, ( SELECT nick, name, id, orgfilename FROM acorn_user ) a WHERE b.id_follow = a.id

SELECT u.orgFileName ,u.id , lc.lcount , fwc.countFollow , fwlerc.countFollower FROM acorn_user u INNER JOIN (SELECT id_writer ,count(id_writer) as lcount FROM acorn_board GROUP by id_writer) lc ON lc.id_writer=u.id INNER JOIN (SELECT id_follow, count(id_follow) AS countFollow FROM acorn_follow GROUP BY id_follow) fwc ON u.id=fwc.id_follow INNER JOIN (SELECT id_follower, count(id_follower) AS countFollower FROM acorn_follow GROUP BY id_follower) fwlerc ON u.id=fwlerc.id_follower WHERE u.id = #{id}
